com.samskivert.jdbc
Class SimpleRepository

java.lang.Object
  com.samskivert.jdbc.Repository
      com.samskivert.jdbc.SimpleRepository
Direct Known Subclasses:
JORARepository, TransitionRepository
public class SimpleRepository
extends Repository

The simple repository should be used for a repository that only needs access to a single JDBC connection instance to perform its persistence services.

Constructor Detail

SimpleRepository

public SimpleRepository(ConnectionProvider provider,
                        String dbident)
Creates and initializes a simple repository which will access the database identified by the supplied database identifier.

Parameters:
provider - the connection provider which will be used to obtain our database connection.
dbident - the identifier of the database that will be accessed by this repository or null if the derived class will call configureDatabaseIdent(java.lang.String) by hand later.
Method Detail

setExecutePreCondition

public static void setExecutePreCondition(SimpleRepository.PreCondition condition)
Configures an operation that will be invoked prior to the execution of every database operation to validate whether some pre-condition is met. This mainly exists for systems that wish to ensure that all database operations take place on a particular thread (or not on a particular thread) as database operations are generally slow and blocking.
